original_title: Nobody knows, when it was made and why
overview: The film Nobody knows, when it was made and why features the Mnemosyne Atlas by Aby Warburg located in the Warburg Institute in London. The film examins the question, if the long-lasting resilience of the Atlas is stemming from geographically dispersed origins and the unresolved, indefinite temporality of its images?
title: Nobody knows, when it was made and why
